title: Smoky Rooms
description: Chance Lassiter is a former rock star on the verge of a new start, after the excesses of the music industry lured him into ruin the first time around.Lindsay Brandon is a former actress trying to rediscover herself after a change of circumstances forced her to make decisions that destroyed her spirit.Can a chance meeting, one lonely night in a corner bar, help them accept the mistakes from their pasts and move toward the future together?
author: Laura Braley
